string-array.name: tt1475582
string-array.item: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy
Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, black-market opportunist Harry Lime.

string-array.name: tt0087182
string-array.item: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor
A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

string-array.name: tt0088847
string-array.item: Five high school students, all different stereotypes
Five high school students, all different stereotypes, meet in detention, where they pour their hearts out to each other, and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

string-array.name: tt0090060
string-array.item: A group of friends, just out of college
A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.

string-array.name: tt0104868
string-array.item: This tells the story of a strong friendship between a young
This tells the story of a strong friendship between a young boy with Morquio's syndrome and an older boy who is always bullied because of his size. Adapted from the novel, Freak the Mighty,...

string-array.name: tt0105946
string-array.item: A space station in neutral territory is the focus of
A space station in neutral territory is the focus of a unique five year saga.

string-array.name: tt0108052
string-array.item: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned
In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

string-array.name: tt0111282
string-array.item: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans
An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

string-array.name: tt0119925
string-array.item: A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins
A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.

string-array.name: tt0129387
string-array.item: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from highschool
A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from highschool, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

string-array.name: tt0249462
string-array.item: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance
A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

string-array.name: tt0457939
string-array.item: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries
Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.
